metadata.title: CVE-2019-5803 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in Content Security Policy in Google Chromeprior to 73.0.3683.75 allowed a remote attacker to bypass content securitypolicy via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
